citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15-1:45pm on 11-
APR-22. The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before
departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15-1:45pm on 11-
APR-22.  The inspector knocked on all doors, honked the horn, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before 
departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
